mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId.id", a.parts_info_id AS "partsInfoId.id", a.num AS "num", a.type AS "type", a.node_num AS "nodeNum", a.table_num AS "tableNum", a.color AS "color", a.thickness AS "thickness", a.piece_length AS "pieceLength", a.total_square AS "totalSquare", b.name AS "orderId.name"
LEFT JOIN ordertable b ON b.id = a.order_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail( id, order_id, parts_info_id, num, type, node_num, table_num, color, thickness, piece_length, total_square ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId.id}, #{partsInfoId.id}, #{num}, #{type}, #{nodeNum}, #{tableNum}, #{color}, #{thickness}, #{pieceLength}, #{totalSquare} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_detail SET order_id = #{orderId.id}, parts_info_id = #{partsInfoId.id}, num = #{num}, type = #{type}, node_num = #{nodeNum}, table_num = #{tableNum}, color = #{color}, thickness = #{thickness}, piece_length = #{pieceLength}, total_square = #{totalSquare} WHERE id = #{id}
